Module schiffeversenken
Package de.uniluebeck.itm.schiffeversenken.game.model

Class GameField

java.lang.Object
de.uniluebeck.itm.schiffeversenken.game.model.GameField
public final class GameField extends Object
This class represents a players field. There are at least two instances of this class in a game.
Author:
leondietrich, modified by I. Schumacher, modified by B. Voss, modified by F. Junghans

    • placeShip

      public void placeShip(int posX, int posY, int length, boolean up, Ship shipToPlace)
      Use this method in order to place ships on the game field.
      Parameters:
      posX - The x coordinate where the ship should begin
      posY - The y coordinate where the ship should begin
      length - The length of the ship to place.
      up - True if the ship should be placed vertically; false otherwise
      shipToPlace - The ship instance to place
